name: wundf-web
description: static website realized with way to complicated tools

scripts.js: BABEL_ENV=client browserify src/client.js -t babelify --extension=.jsx --debug | exorcist src/assets/js/bundle.js.map > src/assets/js/bundle.js && echo 'js bundle ready'
scripts.build-production-server-code: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=server babel src --ignore assets --out-dir tmp
scripts.build: (npm run build-production-server-code & npm run build-production-client-bundle) && npm run css && cp -r src/assets tmp/assets; cp package.json tmp/package.json
scripts.deploy: npm run build && rsync --archive --verbose --exclude-from '.deployignore' tmp/ wundf@wunderundfitzig.de:website; rm -r tmp
scripts.serve-dev: nodemon --exec 'HOST=http://localhost:8080 BABEL_ENV=server babel-node src/server.js' --ext js,jsx --ignore src/assets/
scripts.dev: parallelshell 'npm run watch-js -s' 'npm run watch-css -s' 'npm run serve-dev -s'

author: Manuel Reich
